achievements.desc: Light up the Chenyu Vale map in the Liyue region.

achievements.name: Chenyu's Measure
achievements.desc: Unlock all Teleport Waypoints in Chenyu Vale within the Liyue region.

achievements.name: Jadehall Guide
achievements.desc: Follow 16 Seelie in Chenyu Vale to their Seelie Courts.

achievements.name: Jademound Adventurer
achievements.desc: Complete 12 Open World mechanism-activated Time Trial Challenges in Chenyu Vale.

achievements.desc: Complete 24 Open World mechanism-activated Time Trial Challenges in Chenyu Vale.

achievements.name: Jademound Adventurer
achievements.desc: Complete 48 Open World mechanism-activated Time Trial Challenges in Chenyu Vale.

achievements.name: One Ring for the Rite of All
achievements.desc: Upgrade the Votive Rainjade in Carp's Rest to its maximum level.
